metadata.title: CVE-2017-12481 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The find_option function in option.cc in Ledger 3.1.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedfile.

criterions.comment: ledger package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
